attributes.action: I would like to see the Government & CWGC take Responsibility for, all casualty graves and head stones from all operational Conflicts since WW11.
attributes.additional_details:
I would like to see the Government and CWGC, take responsibility for all Head stones and Graves of Casualties killed on operational duties since WW11.
There are numerous reasons for the neglect of the Graves and Plots, but if we were good enough to give our lives for our country, then the Country should be good enough to look after our mortal remains.
